## ScriptHost.whenIdle() method

Returns a promise that is resolved when the script host is idle

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
whenIdle(debounce?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  debounce | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
